subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Joey Logano became the youngest winner in Nascar Nationwide Series history, cruising to a victory Saturday night in the Meijer 300 at Kentucky Speedway in Sparta.
snippet: Joey Logano became the youngest winner in Nascar Nationwide Series history, cruising to a victory Saturday night in the Meijer 300 at Kentucky Speedway in Sparta.
